function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for non-compliance with pandemic measures due to perceptions of procedural fairness and justice","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and lack of adherence to public health guidelines","Mitigation":"Improve transparency and communication around the creation and enforcement of rules, address concerns about fairness and justice","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms for transparent information sharing, public engagement tools for feedback","People":"General public, individuals","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Influence of political orientation on compliance with COVID-19 measures","Impact":"Divergent attitudes and behaviors towards pandemic measures, leading to inconsistent compliance","Mitigation":"Provide balanced and non-partisan information, address misinformation and polarization","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, social media monitoring and moderation, targeted communication strategies","People":"General public, individuals","Owner":"Media organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Perception of limited choice leading to compliance out of coercion and fear","Impact":"Compliance driven by fear rather than understanding or willingness, leading to resentment and non-compliance in the long term","Mitigation":"Empowerment through education and awareness, address underlying reasons for perceived lack of choice","Technologies":"Educational resources, online learning platforms, community engagement tools","People":"General public, individuals","Owner":"Educational institutions, community organizations"}]}
